nodes.bodyText: java.lang.Math.E it is added to exclusions, but I don't see it in test input file.

I initially put it just to add as a complement to Math.sqrt for the edge case.
I've added it in the appropriate places now.
this comment is outdated now (if Math.E is added), probably should be removed
I've added the Math.E also in the comment, as all the tests have comments for property addition, kept it consistent.
